item.description:
Let's go out to Russell Orchards, take a hayride, pick some apples and eat some fantastic Apple cider Donuts.

At Russell's they have live music, wine tasting, a country store with the best Apple Cider Donuts in New England and rows upon rows of apples to be picked.

Apple picking at Russell's, includes a free hayride, which is required to get to the apple orchards. Handicap accessibility is available but please call the orchards ahead of time.

Fall Music Series The Taters 12:30 PM-3:30 PM is playing on this date. Let's go cheer them on as we enjoy our day out a Russell Orchards.

We look forward to seeing you!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us to the left of the country store!
item.name: Apple picking at Russell Orchards
